headline: Ask HN: What After Rest and Vest?
description:
I am 25 yo and have a good amount of savings. I am burned out from work and I am split between quitting my job and traveling or resting and vesting. I am not sure if I can rest & vest in my company but assuming I can I wonder whether resting & vesting would solve my burnout. At the current stock price I should probably interview & rest and vest elsewhere.

1. What is life like after you are done resting & vesting?

2. Does resting and vesting fix burnouts? I'd be on call every four weeks & be attending meetings and doing some work on the non on call week.

3. I am the kind of person who likes doing things & growing. Resting & vesting makes me paranoid about future job prospects & burning present time where I could be doing those things. Would I just lie in the interviews about my past few years and then work hard in the next job if I choose to?

I wonder if resting & vesting would fix my burnout. I tend to feel guilty for not working while getting paid well(all things considered).
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 休息和背心之后呢？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 休息和背心之後呢？
description_zh-Hans:
我今年25岁，有一笔不错的储蓄。我已经被工作所累，我在辞职和旅行或休息和归属之间徘徊。我不确定我是否可以在我的公司休息和归属，但假设我可以，我想知道休息和归属是否可以解决我的倦怠问题。在目前的股价下，我也许应该在其他地方面试& 休息和归属。在你完成休息& vesting之后，生活是什么样的？

2.休息和vesting能解决倦怠吗？我每四周都要待命，在不待命的那一周要参加会议并做一些工作。

3.我是那种喜欢做事的人，喜欢成长。休息& vesting让我对未来的工作前景& 燃烧我可以做这些事情的现在的时间感到偏执。我是否会在面试中谎报我过去几年的情况，然后在下一份工作中努力工作，如果我选择的话？

我想知道休息& vesting是否能解决我的倦怠问题。我倾向于为不工作而感到内疚，因为我得到了很好的报酬（所有事情都考虑到了）。
